pkgmetadata.longdescription: Visualizing Multi-Species Relative Synonymous Codon Usage and Extensible Data Exploration // Facilitates efficient visualization of Relative Synonymous Codon Usage patterns across species. Based on analytical outputs from 'codonW', 'MEGA', and 'Phylosuite', it supports multi-species 'RSCU' comparisons and allows users to explore visual analysis of structurally similar datasets.
